# Auto-generated for List admin script execution steps
def list_admin_script_execution_steps():
    """Return steps required to run admin automation scripts."""
    steps = [
        "1. Run centralize_admin_contacts_for_app() to gather contacts.",
        "2. Execute keep_each_subfolder_in_sync() to sync AGENTS files.",
        "3. Run maintain_per_app_agents_md() to ensure per-app tracking.",
        "4. Call coordinate_shared_assets_and_templates() to gather templates.",
        "5. Generate docs using document_admin_responsibilities_and_contacts().",
        "6. Update PHASE_EIGHT.md via keep_phase_eight_md_synced_with().",
    ]
    return steps
